a secure card reader for every situation

Aesthetic, compact and designed for your needs

The HiLite

The HiLite is Handpoint's multi-purpose lightweight card reader. Designed with mobility in mind, the HiLite can be paired with a smartphone payment application, allowing your merchants to accept payments virtually anywhere. This elegantly-designed card reader fits in perfectly in its stand right next to a tablet or a computer, but it's just as at home in hand with its ergonomic design. Above all, the HiLite is remarkably easy to use and well-suited for a wide variety of needs.

HiLite Specifications

The HiLite is the most compact and lightweight Bluetooth enabled versatile mobile payment solution. It accepts all forms of payment: Magnetic stripe, EMV Chip & PIN and Contactless cards and this way delivers power and usability in the smallest convenient and stylish device that fits in the palm of your hand.The HiLite meets the latest EMV and PCI PTS 3.x specifications for encrypting PINentry devices.

Functionality Description
Connection Type Bluetooth with iOS, Android and Windows applications
Operator Display 128 x 32 Monochrome LCD, backlight (optional)
Power Supply DC 5V through mini USB / DC 5V through Single charger
Battery Type: Rechargeable Li-Po Battery 3.7 V, 620 mAh
Lifetime in use: Approximately 4h (used continuously for transactions)
Lifetime on standby: Approximately 7h
Reliability 500 000 chip card cycles
1 000 000 magnetic card swipes
1 000 000 button clicks
Certificates CE, FCC, PCI PTS 3.x, EMV Level 1, EMV Level 2, EMV Level 1 Contactless, VISA payWave,MasterCard Contactless, American Express expressPay, Discover Zip, AppleÂ® Mfi
Dimensions W x D x H: 69 x 110 x 17 mm
Weight 123g
Compatible Accessories Stand
Single charger
Multi charger
Order devices

The HiPro

The HiPro card reader fits 5th generation iPhone/iPod touch as well as the iPhone SE. Complete with an integrated barcode scanner, it's an all-in-one payment solution that allows merchants to get out from behind the checkout counter for more personal customer interactions. This terminal has it all: barcode scanner, EMV and MagStripe card reader capabilities, and with a compatible mobile device and mPOS app, you will never want to go back to old-fashioned fixed terminal payment processing again.

HiPro Specifications

The HiPro is the most versatile mobile payment solution. It accepts all forms of payment: Magnetic stripe, EMV Chip & PIN, Contactless cards and includes 2D barcode scanner, which makes the HiPro a powerful POS device.

Functionality Description
Connection Type Lightning with iOS, the Apple device has to be plugged into the HiPro cradle
Operator Display 128 x 32 Monochrome LCD
Power Supply DC 5V through mini USB / DC 5V through Single or 5 stations charger
Battery Type: Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery 3.7 V / 1300 mAh
Lifetime in use: Approximately 21 hours (used continuously for transactions)
Lifetime on standby: Approximately 29 hours
Reliability 500 000 chip card cycles
1 000 000 magnetic card swipes
1 000 000 button clicks
Certificates CE, FCC, PCI PTS 3.x, EMV Level 1, EMV Level 2, EMV Level 1 Contactless, VISA payWave,MasterCard Contactless, American Express expressPay, Discover Zip, AppleÂ® Mfi
Dimensions W x D x H: 68 x 145 x 27 mm
Weight 188g
Compatible Accessories Single charger
Multi charger

Future Device : The HiFive

Handpointâs offerings are constantly evolving to suit the needs of our partners. That is why we will be excited to welcome the newest member to our card reader family in 2017: the HiFive. It will combine the portability and multi-functionality of the HiLite with the capability of WiFi connectivity. Not only that, but the HiFive comes complete with an integrated printer so that youâll never be tied down to a separate cashier station receipt printer ever again!

HiFive Specifications

The HiFive is our desktop mobile payment terminal. It accepts all forms of payment: Magnetic stripe, EMV Chip & PIN and Contactless cards and includes a printer to seamlessly print your receipt.

Functionality Description
Connection Type Bluetooth, Wifi, 3G/4G
Operator Display 128 x 64 Monochrome LCD, backlight / Color LCD, 220 x 176 (optional)
Power Supply DC 9 V, 1 A through power jack
Battery Type: Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery 7.4V/1300 mAh
Reliability 500 000 chip card cycles
1 000 000 magnetic card swipes
1 000 000 button clicks
Certificates CE, FCC, PCI PTS 3.x, EMV Level 1, EMV Level 2, EMV Level 1 Contactless, VISA payWave,MasterCard Contactless, American Express expressPay, Discover Zip, AppleÂ® Mfi
Dimensions W x D x H: 76 x 172 x 49 mm
Weight 320g
Printer Type: Direct line thermal printer
Resolution: 8 x 8 dots/mm (203 dpi x 203 dpi) Paper Width: 58mm
Close

Accept all payment types

The HiLite and the HiPro can process payments via: Magnetic Stripe, Chip & Sign, Chip & Pin, Contactless and support Apple and Android Pay. Handpoint always stays on top of the latest technologies in order to offer the best checkout experience to both the merchant and the cardholder.

The Single Charger

Mostly used for mobile scenarios, the low-profile Single Charger allows the card reader to be removed from the cradle so it can be brought directly to the customer.

The Stand

Designed for fixed point of sale solutions, the stand fits perfectly on a countertop, a discreet charging cable is available on the side of the stand in order to keep the terminal charged at all times.

The Multi Charger

Perfect for larger retailers and restaurants, the Multi Charger allows multiple readers to be charged at the same time and is often used for queue busting scenarios.
